languages.text: {n}Глаза Капеллана на мгновение вспыхивают.{/n} "Хммм... Корабль "Покаяние"... Я не уверен, но вы можете быть правы. Теперь, когда вы про это сказали, я вспомнил одну интересную деталь".
{n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Капеллана на мгновение вспыхивают.{/n} "Хммм... Корабль "Покаяние"... Я не уверен, но вы можете быть правы. Теперь, когда вы про это сказали, я вспомнил одну интересную деталь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... The ship Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

{n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."
{n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

languages.text: {n}牧师的眼睛突然亮了起来。{/n}“嗯……一艘叫‘忏悔号’的飞船……我说不好，但说不定你说得没错。说起这个，我想起了一件有趣的小事。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师的眼睛突然亮了起来。{/n}“嗯……一艘叫‘忏悔号’的飞船……我说不好，但说不定你说得没错。说起这个，我想起了一件有趣的小事。”

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Capellán se iluminan por un instante.{/n} «Mmm... Una nave llamada Arrepentimiento... No estoy seguro, pero puede que tenga razón. Ahora que lo ha mencionado, he recordado un detalle interesante».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Capellán se iluminan por un instante.{/n} «Mmm... Una nave llamada Arrepentimiento... No estoy seguro, pero puede que tenga razón. Ahora que lo ha mencionado, he recordado un detalle interesante».

languages.text: {n}教戒官の目が一瞬だけ光った。{/n}「ふむ…リペンタンスという名の船ですか…わかりませんが、仰るとおりかもしれません。ただ、ひとつ思い出したことがあります」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官の目が一瞬だけ光った。{/n}「ふむ…リペンタンスという名の船ですか…わかりませんが、仰るとおりかもしれません。ただ、ひとつ思い出したことがあります」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriesters Augen blitzen kurz auf.{/n} "Hmm ... Ein Schiff namens Repentanz ... Ich bin nicht sicher, aber Ihr könntet recht haben. Jetzt, wo Ihr es sagt, erinnere ich mich an ein interessantes Detail."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriesters Augen blitzen kurz auf.{/n} "Hmm ... Ein Schiff namens Repentanz ... Ich bin nicht sicher, aber Ihr könntet recht haben. Jetzt, wo Ihr es sagt, erinnere ich mich an ein interessantes Detail."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Chapelain s'illuminent un bref instant.{/n} « Hmm... Un vaisseau appelé Repentance... À vérifier, mais vous pourriez avoir raison. D'ailleurs, maintenant que vous le dites, un détail me revient en mémoire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Chapelain s'illuminent un bref instant.{/n} « Hmm... Un vaisseau appelé Repentance... À vérifier, mais vous pourriez avoir raison. D'ailleurs, maintenant que vous le dites, un détail me revient en mémoire. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz'ın gözleri bir anlığına parlıyor.{/n} "Hımm... Tövbe adında bir gemi... Emin değilim ama haklı olabilirsiniz. Siz böyle deyince aklıma ilginç bir detay geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's eyes flash momentarily.{/n} "Hmm... A ship called the Repentance... I'm not sure, but you might be right. Now that you've said that, I've remembered an interesting detail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz'ın gözleri bir anlığına parlıyor.{/n} "Hımm... Tövbe adında bir gemi demek... Emin değilim ama haklı olabilirsiniz. Bunu duyunca aklıma ilginç bir detay geldi."
